text: Pedro Miguel Miranda Cunha (born 26 March 1998) known as Joca, is a Portuguese footballer who plays for Berço SC as a midfielder. ==Club career== On 4 February 2018, Joca made his professional debut with Varzim in a 2017–18 LigaPro match against Benfica B. ==References== ==External links== * * *Joca at ZeroZero Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:LigaPro players Category:Varzim S.C. players
title: Joca (footballer, born 1998)
